edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rmi.registry

Class KadLocateRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rmi.registry.KadLocateRegistry

  • public final class KadLocateRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    KadLocateRegistry is used to obtain a reference to a remote Registry on a node in a Kademlia network. The returned reference can be used to get references to objects on that node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KadLocateRegistry() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.rmi.registry.Registry createRegistry(int port)
      Uses the LocateRegistry to create and export a Registry instance on the local host that accepts requests on the specified port.
      static java.rmi.registry.Registry getRegistry(ResourceIdentifier nodeKey)
      Gets a reference to a Registry object on a remote Kademlia node identified by the key given in url.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KadLocateRegistry

        public KadLocateRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • createRegistry

        public static java.rmi.registry.Registry createRegistry(int port)
                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Uses the LocateRegistry to create and export a Registry instance on the local host that accepts requests on the specified port.
        Parameters:
        port - the Registry will accept requests on this port.
        Returns:
        a Registry on the local host that is listening on port.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getRegistry

        @Inject
public static java.rmi.registry.Registry getRegistry(ResourceIdentifier nodeKey)
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets a reference to a Registry object on a remote Kademlia node identified by the key given in url.

        The ResourceIdentifier is the key used to look up the Kademlia node on which the Registry is instantiated.

        Parameters:
        url - the Kademlia key
        Returns:
        a reference to the Registry instance on a remote Kademlia node.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
